original_text: By the word of the Lord a man of God came from Judah to Bethel, as Jeroboam was standing by the altar to make an offering.
korean_text: 보라 그 때에 하나님의 사람이 여호와의 말씀으로 말미암아 유다에서부터 벧엘에 이르니 마침 여로보암이 제단 곁에 서서 분향하는지라

sentences.original_text: By the word of the Lord
a man of God came from Judah
as Jeroboam was standing by the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암이 제단 곁에 서 있을 때
